articles.title: How to beat Phantom Ganon in Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom - Polygon
articles.description: Phantom Ganon is a mini boss in Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom. There are three types: sword, spear, and club. Find out how to beat them all, and find Phantom Ganon locations.
articles.content:
Phantom Ganon is a mini-boss you find throughout The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom.
As you explore Hyrule, youll encounter Gloom Hands , a group of enemies which creep out of a gloom pool on… [+5159 chars]
